title: It's amazing how "healthy" this game it's conceived
body:
You get 3 games int feeders, and you lash out. You just say fuck and c nt or other words in that sphere, no threats, no wishing deadly diseases or accidents to the whole family. 

Still not ok, I get it. But then don't int and expect it and report like a prick, you have the mute button. 10 match sus gah and my honor lost to lvl 1, worked so hard on that honor :(

100 games you've been ok. Don't worry here are 3 to fuck you up in a row

Just had to vent. This game is tailored to make you lose your shit.

replies.body:
> But then don't int and expect it and report like a prick...

You do realize that, if someone _is_ intentionally feeding, they're doing it to piss you off. And if they piss you off, and you decide to flame them - their reports against you will be verified.

Don't flame them, and you won't be punished. _Do not feed the trolls_.

> [{quoted}](name=Umbral Regent,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2HhNLF3f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-17T00:40:26.638+0000)
>
> You do realize that, if someone _is_ intentionally feeding, they're doing it to piss you off. And if they piss you off, and you decide to flame them - their reports against you will be verified.
> 
> Don't flame them, and you won't be punished. _Do not feed the trolls_.

While trolls roam freeeeeeee and exploit the flawed prevention system. Yea here i am again.

> [{quoted}](name=Ramyskie,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2HhNLF3f,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-17T00:49:48.086+0000)
>
> While trolls roam freeeeeeee and exploit the flawed prevention system. Yea here i am again.

Trolls require food to survive. The LoL community is just generally immature enough to keep them fed.
Most likely. But everybody has its limits. Guess i got baited
You don't even need to curse. Simply arguing results in punishment these days. Another good one, "general negativity" is enough to earn a permanent ban.

Yeah. Imho the system should have 0 tolerance to threats, but rage outbursts are pretty common and should not be harshly punished. 10 games chat ban is fine, but is annoying that it fucks the honor system 

I get flamed almost every game. Never report simple cursing, I understand. This changes when someone wants me to die or get raped, etc. That's fucked up.
